attributes.action: force local authorities to keep to the 6 day rule over excluded pupils and make it easier for parents to keep them to the law
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: my son who as aspergers was excluded from his special school back in dec 2007, our local authority were unable to supply an education even though the law says they must after 6 days he was  without education until the end of april then it was  only 3 hours a week ..he had no social interaction nothing was offered by them ..if we kept our kids from school we would be fined and then possible prison sentance but the local authoritys are allowed to do nothing.. there is nothing in place for us to fight them...they are told to supply an education and they dont they just complain of no funding or no teachers to teach special needs kids at home .the law needs to be changed they too need to face fines for negleting to supply an education for our children and held responcible for not following the 6 day rule the gov set.
